commit message: Fix #16: Add a setting to disable the automatic version check and customize the check interval
Change AlertDialog button color to match the application theme
Display paused/active status on shows list
Only display paused status if the show is paused
Fix #29: New setting to display the list of banners
Add indicator on show lists when a show is paused when using the banner layout
Move 'Play in external video player' out of the experimental section
Close #21: Add a search option on the list of shows
#2: Disable filters until multiple elements can be selected
